text.sentence: Great weekend - thanks to Miquel for getting us all there and hopefully Kimzey will now not miss the wonders of bachelorhood too much.
Found a camera - digital one in 317 - also have the elvis sun glasses - if the rightful owner would like to step forward - and yes we know who you are.
If you remember, please bring the elvis sunglasses to Kimzey's wedding.
I second the motion to Miguel.
Wexler did a remarkable show yesterday evening, which included a lot of big easy chatter.
Yea thanks Miguel.
I feel like dog sh*t.
What the hell happened this weekend?
All I can say right now is thank you to everybody who showed up and made this weekend one of the most fun memories ever.
And thanks to Miguel and Blake again for organizing everything; I couldn't have done it without y'all.
Once I can put more full sentences together, I'll write more.
Thanks again.
text.signature: - Bryan ps If anybody has seen my Carolina shirt, my cell phone charger, my American Express card and/or my voice, please bring them to my wedding, too.

text.sentence: Kimzey, you did alright my man!
OK, it seems like everyone is making up for lost time tonight.
Go home!
Kimzey, let's go drink!
I think I swallowed a pack of cigarettes this weekend.
Where's that crazy Scotsman?
Happily situated in London trying to recover from the additional lack of sleep post flight -
all I have to say to y'all (no I don't use that turn of phrase in regular conversation) is that I hope you get some more training in prior to the wedding -
after all, losing the second half of July to recovering is not amenable.
Many thanks for the pics Mark - can't wait to see the rest.
